```{r databases}
setwd('..')
path <- getwd()
setwd(paste(path, "/Results/GWAS", sep = ""))
dataFiles <- lapply(Sys.glob("finalres*.csv"), read.csv)
```

```{r}
pvals <- unlist(lapply(dataFiles, "[", c(3)))
hist(pvals)
sum(pvals < (5 * 10^-8))
booltable <- lapply(dataFiles, function(x) x[,3] < (5 * 10^-8))
```
